text: â€œNhothapana, inyu owiittuchiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa ni Amafarisayo! Mwa anafiki! Nnaalhiviha attu isadaka yo nifungu no khumi, ata yo mathaakhuru o nihiriri noonukhelha, manjano ni ijira, uno nhiyaka chittu cho uchuwania cho Malhehero a ashinna Musa, ikiriri ni upisha nrima ni ukhulhuvelhiya. Kinouhimeriani wiira alha phi ayo mwaathananiye inyu uvarelhelha chinene, nhilhiyalhaka makina ayo.
